reviews.review_msg: Lectures are very dry & she reads pretty much everything off her slides which is all basically word for word from the textbook. Not mandatory to go to lectures at all. Midterms are fairly easy and straightforward.

Jodie is intelligent and I feel like she has a lot of interesting stories about her career (aside from teacher) her lectures are kind of boring and she reads off the slides, but the content is so cool that it keeps you listening. She's got sort of a morbid sense of humour, which I found funny, but others might find weird. Super cool!
